thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: ‘Fiduciary Rule’ Poised for Second Life Under Trump Administration

author: Dave Michaels
title: ‘Fiduciary Rule’ Poised for Second Life Under Trump Administration
text:
WASHINGTON—The Trump administration’s threat to dismantle Obama-era rules that cracked down on conflicted advice from stock brokers won’t mean no rules at all. Instead, they could emerge from a different regulator who Wall Street knows a little better.
The Securities and Exchange Commission is accelerating work on its own version of the “fiduciary rule,” a regulation issued by the Labor Department that put restraints on brokers handling retirement accounts. The SEC’s effort would affect all brokerage accounts—not just those...
